oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge for Confederate Pvt. W. I. Osborn
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Osborn enlisted for one year in Co. I, 11th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA on May 18, 1861 and is being discharged in August of 1862 "by virtue of the [Confederate] Conscript Law having served ninety days after the expiration of the twelve months for which he enlisted." Osborn, a farmer, is 36 and was born in Davidson County a physical description is provided. He is being discharged at Wa[u]lden's Ridge in East Tennessee.
